__data__.text:
Chiang MaiBest cake bakerie s 
 
The 27 best cake shops and cake bakeries in Chiang Ma i 
 
Many of us are foodies on the Wanderlog team, so naturally  we’re always on the hunt to eat at 
the most popular spots anytime we travel somewhere new. With favorites like Cheevit Cheeva, 
Dhara Dhevi Cake Shop, and Saruda Finest Pastry and more, get ready to experience the best 
flavors around Chiang Mai. Why trust us We scoured through the internet and read through 4 
reputable sites and blogs like Culture Trip and Big 7 Travel. We gathered all the results in one 
place and ranked them by how many times they were mentioned so you know you're getting the 
best of the be st. Just look for the "mentioned by" tags on each place like these : 
 
 
 
 
1 Cheevit Cheev a 
 
$$$$  affordabl e 
 
Dessert restauran t 
 
Cheevit Cheeva is a well -decorated and trendy dessert cafe in Chiang Mai. It offers a wide 
range of sweet treats, including tiramisu -flavored bubble tea and Oreo cookies and crea m sticky 
rice. The cafe has a modern feel, with little parking available. Coffee and green tea were smooth 
and tasty. This is a great place to hang out . 
 
Very good bingsu here . 
The boba could have been a bit fresher and colder, they were a l ittle mushy and also made the 
bingsu melt really quickly. Within 10minutes our bingsu was soup, which is not normal . 
But overall very good taste and the place has nice interior. Will come back but watch out for the 
hot boba’s . 
Bingsu pictured was the “fe el no grey” flavour, regular size, 205th b 
Julian Thomas — Google revie w 
Lucky that the staff was nice to me maybe because I am a handsome boy? Haha 🤣 i only want 
pudding without bingsu or matcha and they can customise their menu for me. Taste is good. N ot 
expensive actuall y 
 
Thai Jun — Google revie w 
 
 
Nice modern feel. Very little parking. Coffee and green tea was smooth and tasty. Great place to 
hang out . 
 
Brad Davis  
6 ซ อย 7, Tambon Su Thep, Mueang Chiang Mai District, Chiang Mai 50200, Thailand

2. Dhara Dhevi Cake Sho p 
 
 
Cafe Cake shop Coffee sho p 
 
The cafe Dhara Dhevi Cake Shop is a popular spot for dessert lovers who appreciate exquisite 
ingredients and painstakingly crafted desserts. The cafe has an extensive menu of both 
traditional and innovative flavors, as well as superb scones served with homemade jam and 
premium clotted cream . 
 
Want to spoil yourself? The coffee and pastri es are great. Not the cheapest, but you can 
luxuriate in the surroundings, then wander round the fabulous hotel grounds afterwards . 
 
Vietem — Google revie w 
 
Yeah. So, you’ll have to check it out. You’ll pay a bit more but you will be glad you did . 
 
The out door seating area is alive with mosquitoes so bring a repellent . 
 
Sonny Semansco — Google revie w 
 
I ordered takeout this Rose Madeleine. It’s very aromatic and they balance the buttery flavor 
with sourness from raisins. Highly recommend 👍🏻 
 
S. T. — Googl e revie w 
 
51/4 ห มู่ 1 ถนน เช ี ยงใ ห ม่ - ส ันก  ำแ พง , Mueang Chiang Mai District, Chiang Mai 50000, Thailan d 
 
3. Saruda Finest Pastr y 
 
Patisserie This patisserie is known for its French -style pastries, which are some of the best in 
the city. They are delicate and beautifully presented, and the range on offer is quite extensive. 
What w ill definitely catch your eye are the pastries in the shape of different fruits, which have to 
be seen to be believed – and while at first you may resist eating them, they really do taste good . 
 
Two years revisited and still quality product. Glad to see they have survived Covid Always hate 
to break into the pastries - such work of art. Pricey but worth the splurg e 
 
Dundee — Google revie w 
 
As promised, the finest desserts are all here awaiting your admiration and then devouring. Artful 
as they are tasty, with high quality ingredients, the experience is worth every baht. Nice space to 
enjoy your dessert in as well. Looking forward to going again and trying something different . 
 
Kevin B — Google revie w

Best one. It’s not sweet, with perfect match  of taste. Taste is more better than its look . 
No parking lot provided, can park along the street or at One Nimmand and walk to the shop . 
Nongnooch R. — Google revie w 
 
เลข ท ี่  12 Nimmana Haeminda Rd Lane 3, Tambon Su Thep, อ.  เม ื อง , Chiang Mai 50200, 
Thailand•https://www.facebook.com/SarudaPastry / 
 
4. Fern Forest Caf e 
 
Fern Forest Cafe is a popular cafe in the heart of Chiang Mai which specialises in classic and 
global meals as well as desserts and creative drinks. The cafe has a beautifully decorated 
colonial building with an outdoor seating area surrounded by plants. I t is often packed during 
lunchtime, so be sure to book ahead . 
 
Great place pretty busy and lunch time today. Only a good sign. Menu choice is pretty huge. 
Portions that we're served with our food as per the menu. Very well worth the cost. The  staff 
were great, very attentive. Always checking and moving umbrellas to keep the sun ☀️ of the 
clients. Coffee was great. Although I prefer a bigger cup myself. Service for what was ordered 
was pretty quick. Will be back thank you. Have a pleasant holid ay. 
 
Thailand Living In 'Chiang Mai' — Google revie w 
 
Recommended!! ! 
 
I liked sitting in the shade of those trees and had my food. So relaxing just sitting there outdoor. 
The staff were great and polite also the service was not slow. Really enjoy the time spending in 
this atmosphere. I’ll be back again for sure . 
 
Kawinthip Chaiyapong (M I N G) — Google revie w 
 
This is easily one of the nicest cafés I’ve been to in my life. The only slight downfall is the 
service wasn’t very attentive. The food was absolutel y amazing quality, it tasted fresh. The 
prices are totally worth it for the food and peaceful atmosphere. I love the koi fishpond and 
interior. It reminds me a bit of the authors lounge in Mandarin Oriental . 
 
Shreya Gupta — Google revie w

5. Jardin d'ete Gelato and Dessert Cafe by Suan Paa k 
 
Dessert restaura nt Jardin d'ete Gelato and Dessert Cafe is a charming cafe in Chiang Mai that 
specializes in delicious gelato and classic French desserts. The pastry chefs here are skilled, 
using high -quality ingredients to create mouth -watering treats that will leave you  feeling like 
you've been transported to a romantic French villa. Just as the sun sets, head down to Jardin 
d'ete for some of the best gelato in town . 
 
I like this place a lot because they serve the best home -made ice cream in town. The coffe e and 
the cake are also very good. Moreover, the coffeeshop is very well decorated and spacious. And 
big parking lot too . 
 
Petcharee Prachonpachanuk — Google revie w 
 
Love the Gelato. Peach was awesome and the orange dark chocolate what a treat ❤️❤️. 
 
Per Su ndberg — Google revie w 
 
One of the best coffees I have had in Chiang Mai! And the range of cakes and ice creams was 
great. The prices were a bit higher, but warranted due to the good quality. The decor was also 
pleasant, as were the staff . 
 
Steve Kruger — Google revie w 
 
61 Airport Rd. T.suthep A.Mueng Chiangmai, Chiangmai, 52000, 
Thailand•http://www.facebook.com/jardin.dete.chiangma i 
 
Don’t forget to pack anything Stay organized with a to -do list, packing list, shopping list, any kind 
of list. Try it on Wan derlog Try it on Wanderlog Try it on Wanderlo g 
 
6. SS1254372 Caf e 
 
Ember cafe is a great place to get breakfast in Chiang Mai. They have a variety of dishes to 
choose from, and  the food is always delicious. The atmosphere is also really cozy and 
comfortable, which makes it the perfect spot to relax in after a busy day . 
 
Slide 1 of 3 
 
Great place. Had delicious breakfast and coffee here, while seated on the terrace. They offer a 
large amount of options. Staff is friendly. Free wifi. The place has a nice vibe. It's green and has 
an arty vibe. Also got food via grab from this place once, all to my liking . 
 
Bram — Google revie w 
 
Absolutely delicious. They not only serve normal eggs, it has a twist on every dish. I’ll be coming 
back !

Lina Molina — Google revie w 
 
Stopped by for breakfast. Beautiful presentation and fresh food. The decor —especially the 
plants on the terrace are amazing. They were out of avocados saying they weren’t yet ripe. The 
staff spoke English well . 
 
K. A. Keener — Google revie w 
 
Suthep, Mueang  Chiang Mai District, Chiang Mai 50200, 
Thailand•https://www.facebook.com/ss1254372cafe / 
 
7 Woo Cafe -Art Gallery -Lifestyle Sho p 
 
Restauran t 
 
Wo Cafe is an attractive restaur ant with a lifestyle boutique. You can purchase high -end items 
like flowers, cakes, and bags here. The restaurant also has an upstairs gallery for art 
enthusiasts to enjoy . 
 
Slide 1 of 3 
 
Wonderful food. The curry noodles are fantastic. We also ordered an off menu vegetable stir fry 
and it was beyond delicious. And the ambience and setting are truly gorgeous. The brownie is 
also fantastic . 
 
Kristen Edwards Marquardt — Google revie w 
 
This is a really nice place to spend some time, it's like a Cafe inside a s tore with awesome 
decoration. While you sit there you get easily inspired with new ideas for your home decoration. 
Also the food is amazing. Definitely will come back here . 
 
Sebastian Walter — Google revie w 
 
Classy and beautifully decorated restaurant. Cof fee and cake was good. The restaurant seems 
built for big groups though, and didn't seem to have many tables for couples. We ended up 
sharing a big table with another group. But they moved when another table became available . 
 
Catherine C. — Google revie w 
 
80 ถนน เ จ ร ิ ญรำ ษ ฎ ร ์ , Tambon Chang Moi, Mueang Chiang Mai District, Chiang Mai 50000, 
Thailand•http://www.woochiangmai.com /

8.Coco Corne r 
 
 
Cafe Coco Corner is a cafe that specializes in coconu t desserts, such as pies, cakes, ice cream, 
and pudding. The store has a tropical atmosphere with comfortable seating. Customers have 
given the cafe high ratings for its delicious desserts and congenial service . 
 
Slide 1 of 3 
 
Love this little shop! Loads of cute details, minimal and staff is amazing and super kind 😋 food 
is really nice too, the coconut ice cream is good.. and very good value for money! If you don't 
believe me yet, please look at the pics 🤪 
 
Michael Armanno — Google revie w 
 
Amazing smooth y bowl ❤️ very cozy and relaxed tropical interior . 
 
Ruta Gai?auskien? — Google revie w 
 
Clearly the 1 star review Koreans ordered the wrong items from the menu... I ordered the coco 
ice cream and coco pudding as recommended by others too. They are so good e specially the 
pudding!!! $60B for pudding and $125B for the ice cream. Not expensive at all compare to price 
of similar product in North America . 
 
dadrren — Google revie w 
 
Nimmana Haeminda Rd Lane 13, Tambon Su Thep, Mueang Chiang Mai District, Chiang Mai 
50200, Thailan d 
 
9. Harinezumi Caf e 
 
Cafe Coffee store Restauran t 
 
The Harinezumi Cafe is a great place to visit if you're a fan of hedgehogs and guinea pigs. The 
hedgehogs are shy at first, but they will warm up to you quickly. You can also buy food for the 
hedgehogs to eat while you visit . 
 
Slide 1 of 3 
 
Awesome unique place to visit if you think hedgehogs and guinea pigs are cute! 150 baht for 1 
person to spend 1 hour with these guys and that includes the price of any drink. You get to feed 
them and pick them up. Great experienc e 
 
Alixzandrea Lairy — Goog le revie w 
 
A cute lil place with a great hedgehog decor from top to bottom. I know most people came here 
for the "pet an hedgehog experience" but to be honest I don't think they're that keen for the

attention or want to be pet. I was giving an hedgehog to play with but I could see after 2min his 
not really interested and just trying to find a corner to sleep so I left him be. you can still enjoy 
this coffee place for the relax and charming atmosphere of being surrounded by squirreling 
Guinea pig (that are w ay more active than the hedgehogs and are just fun to watch), or to enjoy 
a tasty drink and waffle. I ordered the Kiwi soda and fruit waffle with ice cream and they both 
were great . 
 
karin koala — Google revie w 
 
You hv to order the set meal (299B) to get a  dedicated table + hedgehog to touch/play with. It's 
fun and keeps you occupied. There are also guinea pigs to entertain with. Overall a pleasant 
experience. Am only let down with the poor taste of their coffee (very weak, barely taste the 
coffee). Waffle was not crispy and rather dense. As a cafe that doesn't serve any food except 
waffles/cake and can't get it right, that's disappointing . 
 
BB Then — Google revie w 
 
48/1 Sridonchai Rd, Chang Khlan Sub -district, Mueang Chiang Mai District, Chiang Mai 50100, 
Thailan d 
 
10. Overstand Coffee & Breakfast Chiang Ma i 
 
 
Breakfast restaurant Brunch restaurant Cafe Coffee sho p 
 
Overstand Coffee & Breakfast is well -known as a great spot for breakfast in Chiang M ai. They 
have a variety of options, from classic eggs and toast to more unique items like avocado toast 
and doorstop sandwiches. Their coffee is always excellent, and they're known for their modern, 
airy decor and reliable wifi. This is a great place to wo rk, especially if you're looking for some 
peace and quiet during your morning break . 
 
Slide 1 of 3 
 
Friendly servers, great food and awesome atmosphere. The cafe is tucked away along a narrow 
alley but was pretty easy to find. The cafe is pretty well furni shed and has really cosy vibes 
accompanied with classy music . 
 
If you're in chiangmai I really recommend dropping b y 
 
Michael Dharshwin — Google revie w 
 
Great breakfast. Nice and friendly owner who believes in his work and obviously cooks with 
passion. The  place itself is rather small but well visited and with cute design. No aircon, open to 
the tiny slow life Soi. Will be back for sure . 
 
Matt H (Matt) — Google revie w

Delicious!!!!!, one of the best avocado sandwiches I have ever tasted. I asked for an ext ra fried 
egg as seen in photo for a perfect breakfast. Great coffee too . 
 
Yossi Baa — Google revie w 
 
19/3 Ratchamanka Road Soi 2, Tambon Si Phum, Mueang Chiang Mai District, Chang Wat 
Chiang Mai 50200, Thailan d 
 
I'll never travel to Chiang Mai without this  trip planner agai n 
 
Start planningLearn mor e 
 
I will never travel to Chiang Mai without this app agai n 
 
Available on the App Store Download no w 
 
11. Charin Pi e 
 
Cafe Bakery Pie  shop 
 
Charin Pie is a cafe that offers delicious pies and coffee. It's perfect for those who want to get 
some work done, or just have some peace and quiet. The cafe has a cozy atmosphere, and the 
staff are very friendly and accommodating . 
 
Slide 1 of 3 
 
A cozy place with local vibe. The place is really clean and their music is nice and calming. I 
ordered coconut pie and apple pie. Their coconut pie is very fragrant. You can smell the coconut 
scent even before eating. Their meringue did not use alot of suga r so it won't be chewy or pasty 
like normal meringue but more of like a fluffed up soft gelatinous meringue. Coconut custard is 
super lovely. Not too sweet. Apple pie was also great. Really crunchy crumble. A bit sour with 
the smell of cinnamon. A place to  visit for some pies . 
 
Sonny — Google revie w 
 
Coconut pie was great, they recommended for the bestseller and it good tho Not too sweet and 
cream look like foam lol (melt in my mouth) 🧁🍰 
 
Blueberry cheese cake was good as well 🫐 
 
I came on a rainy day an d in the evening. quite a lot of mosquitoes But don't be afraid that the 
shop has Soffel for mosquito repellent haha. The atmosphere in the evening was good, not hot 
and saw people passing by . 
 
Recommend to sitting outside the shop feels like eating a cake in front of your own house. I like 
it.

Nattapa C — Google revie w 
 
Combination cafe and pie shop (takeout counter) . 
 
The cafe is dark and a bit cramped but coffee is good. Not a comfortable pla ce to work but wifi 
is good . 
 
The pie is ok, coconut pie won't blow your mind but good to try. Meringue is well done. Very 
marshmellow -y. The filling is very plain, like a bland vanilla pudding . 
 
Chocolate pie has a nice flavour overall but (again) the fil ling was disappointing. It tasted exactly 
like any kind of chocolate pudding you would find at 7 -11. There is barely any chocolate flavour . 
 
We liked it but as the 3 stars shows, we were expecting better from a speciality pie shop . 
 
Julian Thomas — Google revie w 
 
20 Nimmana Haeminda Rd Lane 17, Tambon Su Thep, Mueang Chiang Mai District, Chiang Mai 
50200, Thailan d 
 
12. Magokoro Teahouse & Matcha Cafe Chiang Ma i 
 
Tea house Bakery Candy s tore Show 3 mor e 
 
The Magokoro Teahouse & Matcha Cafe Chiang Mai is a charming Japanese tea house located 
in the heart of the old city in Chiang Mai, Thailand. Offering views of the ornamental garden and 
delicious matcha drinks, this quaint tea house is a perfect place to take a break from the heat 
and bustle of city life . 
 
Slide 1 of 3 
 
Cute and small Japanese style tea house cafe, but too crowded as it is so popular among insta 
people. Matcha drink and the cake were super good! I will definitely come back  when there’s 
less crowed ! 
 
Kwang Sujinno — Google revie w 
 
Absolutely LOVED this cute Japanese tea house, not to be missed if you are a matcha lover like 
me! Such a special place for an afternoon break in a calm, peaceful inner garden with lots of 
sweets c hoice ! 
 
1thepianist1 — Google revie w 
 
Wow! The most delicious and pure matcha tea experience. My husband and I stumbled across 
this tea shop during our stay in Chiang Mai. I wish we would have found it sooner so we could 
go every day we were there. I loved  the decor and little outside area. The menu is pretty large 
and can be a little intimidating but everyone was very kind and helpful in describing the items.

We had the traditional ceremonial grade tea set, mochi dessert, and a matcha parfait. 
Everything t asted delicious. Would highly recommend this for any tea drinker and especially 
those who love matcha and sweets like me ! 
 
Kimberly Giang — Google revie w 
 
191/1 Sridonchai Rd, Chang Khlan Sub -district, Mueang Chiang Mai District, Chiang Mai 50100, 
Thailand •http://www.magokoro -tea.com / 
 
13. On cloud nine - a sky full of Dessert s 
 
 
Coffee shop This coffee shop is known for their sweet desserts which fill any craving. The 
exterior is very colorful and Instagramm able, while the interior is just as delicious as they come. 
The staff are always attentive and happy to help . 
 
Slide 1 of 3 
 
The decor is very pretty. For those who love pink and taking photographs, this is the go to place. 
Spotted many tourists and locals  around snapping away with their cameras. The staff is also 
very attentive . 
 
Cynthia Adeline — Google revie w 
 
Definitely one of the prettiest dessert shops in the heart of Nimman. This cafe is decked out in 
layers upon layers of pink which makes it almost impossible to miss. You will often spot many 
ladies taking selfies in and around this cafe. And if you sit outside here long enough, you will 
spot all the hotties eventually. Better yet, go in and order a dessert while you let your eyes feast 
on Chiangmai' s finest...dessert. 😎😁😘😋😎  Staff is very helpful and friendly. They speak 
good English so no worries about getting your orders wrong here . 
 
Terence Tay — Google revie w 
 
Such a pretty dessert cafe! We got the lemonades with a cloud on top (candy floss).  It was so 
good and great in photos. We will be back for sure . 
 
Aisling Mulligan — Google revie w 
 
5 ซ อย 9, Tambon Su Thep, Mueang Chiang Mai District, Chiang Mai 50200, 
Thailand•https://m.facebook.com/Oncloudnineofficial /

14. Rosélato โรเซล ำโ ต ้  
 
Ice cream shop The quaint and inviting ice cream parlour Rosélato sells a balanced mixture of 
traditional Thai desert ingredients and delicious ice cream. The store is small but cozy and 
relaxing, making it a great afternoon visit. The prices are reasonabl e, but the ice cream is quite 
expensive compared to some other shops . 
 
Slide 1 of 3 
 
A balanced mixture of traditional Thai desert ingredients and delicious ice cream. Even though 
the store is small, but its cozy and relaxing atmosphere made it a great aft ernoon visit . 
 
Lee Karatkul — Google revie w 
 
Beautiful ice cream & beautiful presentation. A bit expensive but not unreasonable or relative to 
some other ice cream shops. I had two flavours but I want to try the others ! 
 
Paul O'Neill — Google revie w 
 
Choos e from many flavours available, and they will hand crafted your scoops of ice -cream into 
flower shape. There are many kind of plating available for you to takes picture with and shares 
them to your friend. It was an experience. Well, that was pretty much i t. Drinking water are 
complimentary self service here . 
 
Kirawat Sahasewiyon — Google revie w 
 
Nimmana Haeminda Rd Lane 13, Tambon Su Thep, Mueang Chiang Mai District, Chiang Mai 
50200, Thailand•http://www.facebook.com/roselato.cn x 
 
15. Fruiturda y 
 
Bakery Cafe Dessert shop Fruit and vegetable stor e 
 
Fruiturday is a bakery in Chiang Mai that is revolutionizing the way sweet treats are made in 
Thailand. The bakery features healthier desserts tha t feature fresh fruit as the main star. Enjoy 
juices, smoothies, and desserts such as sticky rice at Fruiturday . 
 
Slide 1 of 3 
 
A fruit smoothie store. It is decorated in modern style. There are 3 tables inside the store and 
plenty of seats outside in the store area. The price is worth the quality of their fruit smoothie. 
The waiting time for their fruit smoothie is around 5 minutes . 
 
Dew Baza — Google revie w 
 
Fruiturday which started in the city of Chiang Mai, has multiple franchises in Thailand. Their fru it 
beverages are made with 100% fresh fruits and ingredients .

Another ‘secret’ lies in a special emulsifier syrup, which helps blend the ice, fruits and 
ingredients smoother . 
 
bado kawaii — Google revie w 
 
I went December 2016. After a busy morning zipping  around town I called in for a smoothie and 
a relax. I went for a durian smoothie and a mango dessert. The smoothie was nice and ice cold 
and so refreshing. The mango dessert was also very nice. So I sat for a while to relax,cool off 
and enjoy my treat. Se rvice was good from the happy staff . 
 
Ian Black — Google revie w 
 
Nimmana Haeminda Rd Lane 11, Tambon Su Thep, Mueang Chiang Mai District, Chiang Mai 
50300, Thailand•http://www.facebook.com/fruiturdaycn x 
 
All travel reservations in 1 place Never dig through  your emails again — access all your flights, 
lodging, and any reservations in 1 place. Try it on Wanderlog Try it on Wanderlog Try it on 
Wanderlo g 
 
16. Khaofang dessert café ソルガム 
 
 
Dessert restau rant Khaofang Dessert Cafe is a must -visit cafe in Chiang Mai, Thailand if you're 
looking for some of the best desserts in the city. The bakery boasts an extensive menu full of 
delicious treats, from cheesecake to tiramisu, and everything in between. Wheth er you're 
celebrating a special occasion or not, Khaofang is definitely worth checking out ! 
 
Slide 1 of 3 
 
Very cute, so nicely detailed both inside and outside...and the desserts...YUMMY!! With 
amazing fresh fruit on top and a delicious and beautiful cafe  latte. Would highly recommend to 
anyone in the area...sir out amid the cozy garden amd enjoy a homemade dessert. Little higher 
price for Chiang Mai, but well worth it and still so affordable. The staff was lovely!! Very kind and 
full of smiles (as is ever yone in Chiang Mai). Don't miss this 'slice' of heaven when ypur on 
vacation or even when you live here. Traet yourself today! What are you waiting for! ! 
 
What Are You Waiting For? — Google revie w 
 
If you have a sweet tooth, you might like this cafe. They do sell coffee too but that's not what the 
customers come for . 
 
On the menu are cakes, desserts and sweetly flavoured iced drinks. Caters mostly to a Thai 
clientele . 
 
Small cosy cafe and airconditioned. Limited spots to park if you drive .

Ed Lee — Google revie w 
 
The best cafe I've ever been to in Chiangmai so far. I think what makes this place the best is 
they have a passion in making cafe . 
 
Sir Avernus — Google revie w 
 
3/1 ซ อย5 ถ. ห ม ื่นด ้ ำม พร ้ ำคต , ช ้ ำงเผ ือก  เม ื อง , Chiang Mai 50300, 
Thailand•https://www.facebook.com/khaofangdesser t 
 
17. iberry Garde n 
 
 
Ice cream sho p 
 
This well -known ice cream shop has a great selection of desserts to choose from, including ice 
cream, smoothies, bingsu and cake. It has an outdoor garden with twinkle lights that is perfect 
for enjoying your sweet treats under the stars . 
 
Slide 1 of 3 
 
Ice cream party is great. Sm oothie is plain & expensive. Great to spend time here to relax after 
exhausted by hot walking in the town . 
 
Nhat Hoang — Google revie w 
 
We get waffle, cake and one drink. (more than 400 bath) I was thinking the high price was worth 
it with quality but isn' t like that. but only average quality. Other coffee and ice cream shop are 
more tasty with better prices . 
 
6 Italiano — Google revie w 
 
The environment and beauty of decorating is in a modern style. However due to there are a lot 
of newly opened business. T his ice cream parlor is dropped in biz. Need some refresh up. The 
taste of ice cream is OK . 
 
Aey Angel — Google revie w 
 
13 Sai Nam Phueng Alley, Tambon Su Thep, Mueang Chiang Mai District, Chiang Mai 50200, 
Thailand•http://www.iberryhomemade.com / 
 
18. Coffee  Waan 
 
Coffee shop Caf e 
 
Waan Cafe is a coffee shop located in Nimman with funky decor and excellent coffee. It's great 
for enjoying a cup of coffee while catching up on work or checking out th e local scene. They

also have a range of delicious desserts to choose from, all made with the utmost care and 
precision . 
 
Slide 1 of 3 
 
Firstly, I should mention I’m a New Yorker. My coffee standards are higher than most. I had a 
mocha here and it was on p ar with anything I would get back home. Super strong, just a hint of 
sweet like dark chocolate(obv you can always add more sugar if you like). Super cute little place 
to hang out w WiFi. The owner also has an awesome collection of hard to find craft beer: 
Rogue, Grimm, Stone and will happily chat w you about it ! 
 
Claire Townsend — Google revie w 
 
The coffee here is delicious and the price is very reasonable. The owners are also super -friendly 
and polite . 
 
Matt Nunn — Google revie w 
 
Nice place with cheap coff ee. I had an iced latte for 40 Baht. I remembered to ask for no sugar. 
They have free wifi. You can park your bike/moped outside. They have aircon . 
 
Dean Southall — Google revie w 
 
22 Kampangdin Rd, Chang Khlan Sub -district, Amphoe Mueang Chiang Mai, Chang Wat 
Chiang Mai 50100, Thailand•https://www.facebook.com/pages/Cafe -Waan -
%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%B2%E0%B … 
 
19. BrandNew Field Goo d 
 
Restauran t 
 
BrandNew Field Good is a cafe and restaurant that is set in scenic countryside. It offers a 
traditional Thai menu, as well as iced teas and beers . 
 
210 ห มู่ ท ี่  2, Ban Pong, Hang Dong District, Chiang Mai 50230, 
Thailand•http://www.facebook.com/brandnewfieldgoo d 
 
20. Chaseki Teahouse Chiang Ma i 
 
 
Tea house Education center Tea stor e 
 
Chaseki Teahouse Chiang Mai is a lovely, quality tea house in the city of Chiang Mai. It serves a 
range of traditional and modern matcha -based drinks and lattes, as w ell as tempting dessert 
menus. The teahouse is popular with tourists for its convenient location near many shopping 
areas, and it's also great for taking a break from the hustle and bustle of the city .

Slide 1 of 3 
 
Outstanding Japanese tea and matcha tea  house. They offer a nice range of mixed tea drinks to 
pure premium matcha, and also Japanese tea training. Highly recommended ! 
 
Mark Wiens — Google revie w 
 
We came because of the nice pictures from the garden. They told us, that the pictures are all 
from their old shop that closed already. Here it is just a small inside cafe with no garden and not 
much space for many people . 
 
judith loetsupan — Google revie w 
 
Mmm, a nice Japanese style tea shop in Chiang Mai. A bit pricey at 130 baht, but it was quite 
nice. Normally this would be a quiet space to work, but they are shooting a YouTube video so a 
bit of chatting today. Good spot to try if you're tired of the usual cafe. #chiangmai #thailand

Wako Bake is a local Japanese -inspired café, with a beautiful ornamental ga rden and creative

signature dish is the cubic choux cream, which comes in several different flavors - you really

There are meeting rooms for rent at reasonable rates .
